connecting: 正在连接启动器以获取信息...

game_unpatched: Mod启动器已找到您的游戏副本。 您需要修补游戏，以便可以加载mod。

first_configure_launcher_key_bindings: Run the launcher to edit your key bindings.
no_published_mods: No mods have been published for this game yet. Check back soon...
